Callback10Header: Speak with Clone Questgiver at Location B
Callback18Header: Follow Clone Questgiver to Location B
Name: Template: Clone A to B
Phase0Description:
The objective is to speak with the NPC at Loc B, but the existence of the Clone effectively delays that.

Following the Clone is technically optional, since you can leave the game and come back to find the NPC at Loc B.
Toast: Transition an NPC from A to B with a Personal Clone
